title: FS:  T3 Turkey Red  Cy Young - PSA-4  *LOWER PRICE*
author: T3s

posts.post_title: FS:  T3 Turkey Red  Cy Young - PSA-4  *LOWER PRICE*
posts.post_content:
EBAY is going to ding me 10% if I sell there, make me an offer and I'll do my best to work it out with you.  Thanks!

For Sale is a relatively iconic baseball card, the T3 Turkey Red Cy Young.   

T3 prices are not going down - but my prices are not going up!

Graded PSA-4 as you can see.  The card has a "crescent" shaped crease running thru Cy's right calf.  The focus, clarity, contrast and color are absolutely spot on - I've seen a lot of Turkey Reds and this one is top-notch in that regard.

SMR shows $2750, nor sure what VCP says -I am asking $2500 OBO.

If you are looking for other graded T3s, I just recieved a batch of about 60 back from PSA - lots of great cards, the majority being in the PSA-3 range, so they are priced to sell.  I also have a PSA-4 Matty, a PSA-3 Lajoie and a few other nice HOFers.

Thanks for looking,
Craig
